$:/plugins/tg/layout/combination.text:
In case two or three of the following plugins: * Top menu ^^1^^ or Top-left menu ^^1^^ * Top toolbar ^^1^^ * Tiddlersbar ^^1^^ are to be combined, some adjustments to the layout are necessary to prevent overlapping parts. The following gives the general procedure. # Click the ''Adjust layout'' button (<>) in the top right bar or click [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]] and select the Theme tweaks tab ## To create extra room on top, increase ''Story top position'' # Select the Layout tab and increase ''Height topbar'' # If required, adjust the 'Top' settings of
* 'Top menu' (tab Top menu, setting ''Top 'Top menu''') * 'Top-left menu' (tab Top-left menu, setting ''Top 'Top menu''' & setting ''Top 'Left menu''') * 'Toolbar' (tab Toolbar, setting ''Top 'Toolbar''') * 'Tiddlersbar (tab Tiddlersbar, setting ''Top 'Tiddlersbar''')
# Some tweaking of the above values # Adjust ''Sidebar top position'' in Theme tweaks tab until wiki title and tiddler title are level. ^^''1''^^ Available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/ <<< ''Note:''
http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/ shows the combination of 'Top menu', 'Toolbar' and 'Tiddlersbar'. <<<
$:/plugins/tg/layout/combination.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/combination

$:/plugins/tg/layout/css-units.text: * You can enter values in allowed CSS units, e.g. `%`, `px`, `em`, ... * You can enter colors: ** by name, e.g. `red`, `blue`, ... see [[w3schools|https://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_colornames.asp]] ** as 6 (sometimes 3) digit Hex color code, e.g. `#FF0000` (or `#F00`) ** with the color macro, e.g. `<>`.
$:/plugins/tg/layout/css-units.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/css-units

$:/plugins/tg/layout/readme.text:
''Note:''
This plugin contains 'general' settings for the layout and is additionally required for my following plugins: ^^1^^ * Top menu * Top-left menu (top + left menu) * Toolbar (on top) * Tiddlersbar * ~TabStory (alternative tiddlersbar at top of story) * Uptoolbar (toolbar above title) * Tristate (tristate sidebar) This plugin contains layout code common to the mentioned plugins and let you adjust: !! Theme tweaks * Sidebar layout * Story left position * Story top position * Story right * Story width * Tiddler width * Sidebar top position * Sidebar width !! Layout tweaks * Checkboxes ** Display layout button (<>) ** Search above story ** Toolbar to toggle editor toolbar + preview ** Sort recent results alphabetical ** Button to top of story river ** Hide description Tools tab buttons ** System tags tab ** Recent dates bold ** Sticky titles *** Add sticky editor toolbar (when titles are sticky) ** Set tiddler toolbar above the tiddler title ** Tagging in view mode ** Field handling in view mode ** Setting type in view mode * Other settings ** Color and height of the top bar (as a boundary for top menu, toolbar, tiddlersbar, etc.) ** Top padding of a tiddler ** Color for displaying the 'active' state of some toggle buttons Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]'', also available via the 'Adjust layout' button (<>) in the Toprightbar. |borderless|k |^^^1^^ |  |All these plugins contain a 'Settings' tiddler tagged with $:/tags/plugin-tweaks and will display - when installed - a tab under 'Plugin tweaks'.| <<< ''Note:''
@@color:red;A sticky editor toolbar works ''only'' well in non-preview mode!.@@ <<<
$:/plugins/tg/layout/readme.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/readme
$:/plugins/tg/layout/readme.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings.text:
!!Layout tweaks |Layout tweaks |<|h |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/configuration-button" tag="$:/tags/TopRightBar"> 'Adjust layout' button|<>| |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/search" tag="$:/tags/AboveStory"> 'Search above story river'|<| |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/toggle_toolbar" tag="$:/tags/EditTemplate"> Toolbar 'Toggle editortoolbar/preview'|<| |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/timeline-macro" tag="$:/tags/Macro"> 'Sort recent alphabetical'|<| |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/button2top/style" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> 'Button to top of story river'|<| |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/tools/style" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> 'Hide description Tools tab buttons'|<| |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/systemtags" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> 'System tags tab'|<| |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/recent-dates-bold/style" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> 'Recent dates bold'|<| |{{$:/plugins/tg/layout/sticky-editor-toolbar}}|<| |{{$:/plugins/tg/layout/toolbar-up/ckeckbox}}|<| ||| ||| |View mode extensions |<|h |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags" tag="$:/tags/ViewTemplate"> Tagging in view mode|If checked, reorder via
<>| |{{$:/plugins/tg/layout/field-handling-checkbox}}|~| |<$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/type" tag="$:/tags/ViewTemplate"> Setting type in view mode|~| @@.brown ''Top bar''@@ <> <> @@.brown ''Tiddler''@@ <> @@.brown ''Button color''@@ <>
<<< ''Note:'' * @@color:red;For a 'Top bar' to become visible, a ''color'' (and a ''height > 0px'') need to be entered!@@ * The height of the Top bar is also the offset for sticky titles; the sticky editor toolbar gets an extra 40px offset ** @@color:red;A sticky editor toolbar works ''only'' correct in non-preview mode!@@ <<< <$button tooltip="Help"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings-help" height="800px" width="720px"/>Help
$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/settings
$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings-help.text:
|Layout tweaks |<|<|<|h |Item|Entry |Description |Default |h |'Adjust layout' button | / |'Adjust layout' button in Toprightbar| | |'Search above story river' | / |Advanced search above story river ^^''1''^^| | |Toolbar 'toggle editortoolbar/preview' | / |Toolbar - in edit mode - below tags| | |Sort recent results alphabetical | / |Sort recent results each day in alphabetical order| | |'Button to top of story river' | / |Button to jump to top of story river| | |'Hide description Tools tab buttons' | / |Hide decriptions next to buttons under Tools tab| | |'System tags tab' | / |Add a System tags tab| | |'Recent dates bold' | / |Show dates in recent tab bold| | |Sticky titles| / |Causes tiddler titles to "stick" to the top| | | Sticky editor toolbar| / |If titles are sticky, editor toolbar will be sticky as well when checked| | |Set tiddler toolbar above the tiddler title| / |Creates more room for tiddler title ^^2^^| | |View mode extensions ^^''3''^^|<|<|<|h |Tagging in view mode| / |Adds the tag picker in view mode| | |Field handling in view mode| / |Adds adding /editing fields in view mode| | |Setting type in view mode| / |Adds setting type in view mode| | |Top bar / tiddler / button color|<|<|<|h |Item |Entry |Description |Default |h |''Topbar'' |Background color 'Top bar'|Background color of the top bar
Transparent when left 'blank'!| `<>` | |~|Height 'Top bar'|Height of the top bar| 40px | |''Tiddler'' |Top padding |Top padding of tiddler | 30px | |''Button color''|Active button color |Color indicating 'active' state of toggle button | `<>` | |borderless|k |^''@@font-size: 0.8em;1@@'' |  |• In classic storyview: scroll up to reach search
• In zoomin view search always visible| |^''@@font-size: 0.8em;2@@'' ||Adds 'Toolbar - title' tab to Plugin tweaks with settings for layout of tiddler toolbar| |^''@@font-size: 0.8em;3@@'' ||You can reorder these entries by clicking <> + drag & drop|
$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings-help.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/settings-help
$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings-help.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/layout/styles.text:
/* LAYOUT SETTINGS */

/* VERTICAL OFFSET FOR TOP OF SIDEBAR */
html .tc-sidebar-scrollable {
    top: {{$:/plugins/tg/layout/sidebar-top}};
}

* BACKGROUND COLOR TOPRIGHTBAR (with double chevron) */
.tc-topbar {
     background-color: {{!!topbar-background-color}};
}

/* TOPBAR */
.tgc-toolbar {
     display:block;
     position:fixed;
     left:0px;
     top:0px;
     width:100%;
     height: {{!!topbar-height}};
     background-color: {{!!topbar-background-color}};
     z-index: 600;
}

/* TOP PADDING TIDDLER */
body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-frame {
     padding-top: {{!!tiddler-padding-top}};
}

/* COLOR ACTIVE STATE TOGGLE BUTTON */
body.tc-body .tgc-active-indicator {
     color: {{!!active-state-color}};
}
body.tc-body .tgc-active-indicator svg {
     fill: {{!!active-state-color}};
}

body.tc-body .tgc-active-indicator:hover svg {
     fill: <>;
}

/* HIDE BUTTON2TOP WHEN NOT ACTIVE */
.tgc-fixed-bottom {
     display: none;
}

/* TITLE - TOOLBAR SPACING */
html .tgc-tiddler-title-space {
     line-height: {{!!title-toolbar-spacing}}; 
}

/* SIZE OF TIDDLER BUTTONS */
html .tc-tiddler-controls button svg {
     height: {{!!tiddler-button-size}};
}

/* SPACE BETWEEN TIDDLER BUTTONS */
html .tc-tiddler-controls button {
     margin-left: {{!!tiddler-button-spacing}};
}

/* SETTINGS TABLE */
/* WIDTH SETTINGS TABLE */
input[type='text'].settings {
     width: 150px;
}
table.tablestyle {
     font-size: 0.9em;
     border-width: 0px;
     border-style: solid;
     padding: 2px;
     border-color: #DDD;
     border-collapse: collapse;
}
table.tablestyle th {
     background-color: #F0F0F0;
     border-color: #DDD;
     text-align: left;
     vertical-align: top;
     border-style: solid;
     border-width: 1px;
     padding: 5px;
}
table.tablestyle tr {
     background-color: #F0F0F0;
     padding: 0px;
}
table.tablestyle td {
     border-color: #DDD;
     border-style: solid;
     border-width: 1px;
     padding:2px;
}
/* COLOR HEADINGS TABLE */
.brown {
     color: #884411;
     font-weight: bold;
}
/* BORDERLESS TABLES */
.borderless, .borderless table, .borderless td, .borderless tr, .borderless th, .borderless tbody {
     border:0 !important;
     margin:0 !important;
     padding:0 !important;
}
$:/plugins/tg/layout/styles.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/styles
$:/plugins/tg/layout/styles.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/layout/themetweaks-help.text:
|Item |Entry |Description |Default |h |Theme tweaks |^Sidebar layout |^Choice between Fluid story, fixed sidebar and Fixed story, fluid sidebar|Fluid story, fixed sidebar ^^1^^| |~|^Story left position |^How far the left margin of the story river (tiddler area) is from the left of the page| 0px| |~|^Story top position |^How far the top margin of the story river is from the top of the page| 0px ^^2^^| |~|^Story right |^How far the left margin of the sidebar is from the left of the page| 770px| |~|^Story width |^The overall width of the story river| 770px| |~|^Tiddler width |^Within the story river| 686px| |~|^Sidebar top position |^Start of the sidebar
(from the top)| 0px ^^2^^| |~|^Sidebar width |^The width of the sidebar in fluid-fixed layout| 350px| |borderless|k |^''@@font-size: 0.8em;1@@'' ||''Fluid story, fixed sidebar interferes with Tristate plugin'' => select Fixed story, fluid sidebar for Tristate plugin | |^''@@font-size: 0.8em;2@@'' |  |Default values; ''need to be adjusted (increased) in case of adding a top menu, toolbar, tiddlersbar, ... to the wiki!''|
$:/plugins/tg/layout/themetweaks-help.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/themetweaks-help

$:/plugins/tg/layout/toggle_toolbar.text:
Toggle editor toolbar <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/TextEditor/EnableToolbar" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"></$checkbox>   Toggle preview <$reveal state="$:/state/showeditpreview" type="nomatch" text="no">
<$button set="$:/state/showeditpreview" setTo="no" tooltip="Hide preview" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/preview-open}}</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/state/showeditpreview" type="match" text="no">
<$button set="$:/state/showeditpreview" setTo="yes" tooltip="Show preview" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/preview-closed}}</$button>
</$reveal>
 Scrollable preview <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/style_scroll_preview" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"></$checkbox>  Toggle sidebar {{$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu}}
$:/plugins/tg/layout/toggle_toolbar.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/toggle_toolbar
$:/plugins/tg/layout/toggle_toolbar.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks.text:
The general layout adjustments can be found under the 'Themes tweak' and 'Layout tweaks' tabs. Dependent on installed plugins other tabs are available ('Top menu', 'Top-left menu', 'Top toolbar', 'Tiddlersbar, '~TabStory', 'Uptoolbar', 'Tristate').
<<tabs "[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/plugin-tweaks]nsort[order]]" "$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings" "" "tc-vertical">>
$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks
$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks.caption: Plugin tweaks

$:/plugins/tg/layout/upgrade.text:
Recommended before upgrading one of the following plugins:

* Layout adjustment
* Top menu
* Top toolbar
* Tiddlersbar

<hr>


# Note down all adjustments made in the Settings section of the plugin
# Delete the following overridden shadow tiddlers of the plugin:
#* Settings
#* Styles
# Upgrade the plugin
# Reapply the settings
$:/plugins/tg/layout/upgrade.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/upgrade

$:/plugins/tg/layout/timeline-macro.text:
\define timeline-title() <$view field="title"/> \end \define timeline(limit:"100",format:"DDth MMM YYYY",subfilter:"",dateField:"modified")
<$list filter="[!is[system]$subfilter$has[$dateField$]!sort[$dateField$]limit[$limit$]eachday[$dateField$]]">
<$view field="$dateField$" format="date" template="$format$"/> <$list filter="[sameday:$dateField${!!$dateField$}!is[system]$subfilter$sort[]]">
<$link to={{!!title}}> <>
\end
$:/plugins/tg/layout/timeline-macro.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/timeline-macro

$:/plugins/tg/layout/button2top/style.text:
/* BUTTON TO TOP */
.tgc-fixed-bottom {
     display: block;
     position: fixed;
     bottom: 10px;
     right: 10px;
     padding: 8px;
     background-color: <>;
}
.tgc-button-color {
     color: {{$:/plugins/tg/layout/styles!!active-state-color}};
}
.tgc-button-color:hover {
     color: <>;
}
$:/plugins/tg/layout/button2top/style.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/button2top/style

$:/plugins/tg/layout/recent-dates-bold/s.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/recent-dates-bold/style

$:/plugins/tg/layout/tools/style.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/tools/style

$:/plugins/tg/layout/sticky.text:
<$reveal state="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles" type="match" text="yes">
``
.tc-tiddler-title {
     position: -webkit-sticky;
     position: -moz-sticky;
     position: -o-sticky;
     position: -ms-sticky;
     position: sticky;
     top: ``{{$:/plugins/tg/layout/styles!!topbar-height}}``;
     background: ``<<colour tiddler-background>>``;
     z-index: 500;
}
.tc-editor-toolbar {
     position: -webkit-sticky;
     position: -moz-sticky;
     position: -o-sticky;
     position: -ms-sticky;
     position: sticky;
     top: ``calc({{$:/plugins/tg/layout/styles!!topbar-height}} + 40px)``;
     background: ``<<colour tiddler-background>>``;
     z-index: 500;
}

``
<$list filter="[range[100]]">
`.tc-story-river .tc-tiddler-frame:nth-child(100n+`<$text text=<<currentTiddler>>/>`) {
z-index: `<$text text={{{ [[200]subtract<currentTiddler>] }}}/>`;
}
`
</$list>
</$reveal>
$:/plugins/tg/layout/sticky.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/sticky

$:/plugins/tg/layout/toolbar-up.text:

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"><$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide"><$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"><$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value={{$:/config/Tiddlers/TitleLinks}}> <$link>
 
<$set name="foregroundColor" value={{!!color}}> >> <$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}/> <$list filter="[all[current]removeprefix[$:/]]">

$:/plugins/tg/layout/toolbar-up/ckeckbox.text:
<$checkbox
field="up"
checked="yes"
unchecked="no"
default="no"
checkactions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/toolbar-up" title="$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings-toolbar-up" tags="$:/tags/plugin-tweaks"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title" tags="$:/tags/ViewTemplate"/>"""
uncheckactions="""
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title"/>
<$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/layout/settings-toolbar-up" tags/>"""
>
 Set tiddler toolbar above the tiddler title
</$checkbox>

$:/plugins/tg/layout/field-handling.text:

<$list filter="[all[current]fields[]] +[sort[title]]" variable="currentField"> <$list filter=<> variable="temp">
<$text text=<>/>: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field=<> placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}}/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Remove/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Remove/Caption}}> <$action-deletefield $field=<>/> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
<$fieldmangler>
<> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/newfieldname" tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Name/Placeholder}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-popup-handle"/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Dropdown/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Dropdown/Caption}}>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$linkcatcher to="$:/temp/newfieldname">
<>
<$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]search:title{$:/temp/newfieldname}sort[]] -created -creator -draft.of -draft.title -modified -modifier -tags -text -title -type" variable="currentField"> <$link to=<>> <>
<>
<$list filter="[fields[]search:title{$:/temp/newfieldname}sort[]] -[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]]" variable="currentField"> <$link to=<>> <>
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/newfieldvalue" tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}} class="tc-edit-texteditor"/> <$macrocall $name="new-field"/>

$:/plugins/tg/layout/sticky-editor-toolb.text:
